item.title: Best Extensions for Google Chrome
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: {{ youtube ZZPjCvOrzGo {} The best thing about Google Chrome is all the extensions that are available for it. Now I recently learned that Microsoft Edge also has extensions, but nowhere near as many as google chrome. By no means is this an exhaustive list of all the best extensions for Google Chrome; just a few of my favorites that I use every day. Ghostery If you are concerned about your privacy on the internet, then Ghostery is the perfect app for you.
